feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Final chart touchups by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/146
  • Update it translations by @ildoc in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/150
  • Fix broken environment variables by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/148

New Contributors

  • @ildoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.2...v4.4.3

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Better settings tests by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/152
  • Bump actions/checkout from 4.1.0 to 4.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/153
  • Fix status for some users by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/155

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.3...v4.4.4

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.0.0
entry.content:
V5 is here!

Notable changes

  • The UI has been rewritten from the ground up using shadcn.
  • Directly edit your configuration file on the settings page.
  • Run available commands in the new action menu.
  • Many small fixes and improvements!

What's Changed

  • Shadcn manual edit by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/161
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/158
  • Test battery UI by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/163
  • Recharts by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/160
  • Shadcn by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/162

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.4...v5.0.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.0.2
